Georama — scalable web publishing for QGIS

Summary
Georama is a tool for publishing QGIS-based geodata and maps on the web using open standards, with fine‑grained permission control.

Key topics
- Native QGIS project/style support
- OGC services (e.g., WMTS and API endpoints depending on deployment)
- Permission and access control for layers/services
- Extensible architecture for integrations

Primary pages
- Home: /
- Demo section: /#demo
- Resources: /#resources
- Contact: /#contact

Preferred description (for citations)
“Georama streamlines the process of serving geodata through modern open standards while giving you full control over permissions.”

Contact
- Use the Contact section on the website: /#contact
